name: The Nightmares of an Eyeball Man
name_original: The Nightmares of an Eyeball Man
description:
The game is not done yet. I work on it as much as I can and I listen to my fans. Game development will be posted on TikTok and YouTube.  Bug reports can be submitted on the Discord. This is my first video game, I still have lots to learn and lots to add. I will need help from coders later down the road. I'm only an artist, coding is still new to me. Thanks for your patience and I hope you enjoy it!

Discord: https://discord.gg/RzbrEQq

TikTok: GlarkerGames
